name: newsGuru
0:
”Alexa ask news guru to get me the latest news”
”Alexa ask news guru what are the top news in India”
”Alexa ask news guru to get me the trending news of India”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news guru
des: You can get the latest trending news of India. Jus ask Alexa to get the latest news and it will update you the latest trending news. It gets the news from an external Source.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
